Name: Canterbury Caledonian Society Pipe Band
rawData:
The Canterbury Caledonian Society Pipe Band is a grade one pipe band based in Christchurch, New Zealand.
The band's Pipe Major is Jamie Hawke; lead drummer is Brayden Drummond.

Notable honours: 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2019 National New Zealand Pipe Band & Drum Corps Championships
